concept.title: Required Fields in Processors
concept.shortdesc: A required field must exist in a record to keep it in the pipeline. When a record does not include a required field, the processor drops the record. You can configure required fields for any processor stage.

conbody.p: To minimize processing errors, define any field that a processor actively uses as a required field.

For example, the following Expression processor concatenates the first and last name fields. To avoid processing errors, both fields are configured as required fields.create screenshot with dev source
